successes.title: Stepcraft 2: Universal Desktop CNC / 3D Printer / Laser
successes.description: Stepcraft universal desktop CNC solution. Turn your ideas into reality - CNC milling, 3D Printing, Laser Cut/Engraving and much more!

Pledges.description:
STICK WITH US!
You will receive our sincere thanks as well as a Stepcraft 2 sticker.

HEADS UP!
Receive a Stepcraft 2 baseball hat with our thanks.

Stepcraft 2 300 Desktop *Crafty* package. 
This package includes:
- CNC motion control software 
- USB interface board
- Dremel/Proxxon/Other Spindle adapter
- Drag Knife
- Stepcraft Hat
- Intro to CNC ebook

Stepcraft 2 420 Desktop *Crafty* package. 
This package includes:
- CNC motion control software (Starter Version)
- USB interface board
- Dremel/Proxxon/Other Spindle adapter
- Drag Knife
- Stepcraft Hat
- Intro to CNC ebook

Stepcraft 2 600 Desktop *Basic* package. 
This package includes:
- Parallel interface board
- Dremel/Proxxon/Other Spindle adapter
- Stepcraft Hat
- Intro to CNC ebook

Stepcraft 2 600 Desktop *Crafty* package.

Stepcraft 2 600 Desktop CNC Mill and Carve package. This package includes:
- CNC motion control software (Full Version)
- USB interface board
- Vectric Cut 2D software
- Dremel/Proxxon/Other Spindle adapter
- Dremel 4000 rotary tool
- Bits: 1/8" end mill, 1/8" ball nose, 1/16" ball nose
- Stepcraft Hat
- Intro to CNC ebook
